snippet: The lawyers for Aaron Greene, who is charged with keeping an explosive chemical in his Greenwich Village apartment, criticized investigators' conclusions and said the police had leaked "innuendos, half-truths and slurs."
abstract: The lawyers for Aaron Greene, who is charged with keeping an explosive chemical in his Greenwich Village apartment, criticized investigators' conclusions and said the police had leaked "innuendos, half-truths and slurs."

headline.main: Lawyers Say Police Confused Bomb Suspect's 'Doodle' With Nazi Symbol
